name: Mailstore
description: Enhance business processes by streamlining email management, supporting both IMAP and POP3 with robust SSL encryption.

descriptions.value: Enhance business processes by streamlining email management, supporting both IMAP and POP3 with robust SSL encryption.
MailStore - der Standard für rechtssichere E-Mail-Archivierung kann mühelos in Axon Ivy Prozesse integriert werden.
